item.title: Blythe add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Life is too short, or too long, for me to allow myself the luxury of living it so badly." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Blythe add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "The two hardest tests on the spiritual road are the patience to wait for the right moment and the courage not to be disappointed with what we encounter." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Blythe add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "What's the world's greatest lie?... It's this: that at a certain point in our lives, we lose control of what's happening to us, and our lives become controlled by fate." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Blythe add a quote by A.A. Milne
Blythe add a quote by Jane Hirshfield
item.description: "You may do this, I tell you, it is permitted. Begin again the story of your life." -- Jane Hirshfield
